You can create an AugenPriceSpike indicator that does not automatically update. This lets you update the indicator with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the AugenPriceSpike constructor.

AugenPriceSpike()1/1

            AugenPriceSpike QuantConnect.Indicators.AugenPriceSpike (
    *string                       name,
    *Int32                       period,
   )

Creates an AugenPriceSpike indicator for the name. The indicator will be automatically updated on the given resolution.

Parameters
*string name (Optional) The custom name of the indicator whose APS we want.
*Int32 period (Optional) The period of the APS.

Return

AugenPriceSpike - The AugenPriceSpike indicator for the given parameters

Definition at file Indicators/AugenPriceSpike.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.

private AugenPriceSpike _aps;

// In Initialize()
_aps = new AugenPriceSpike();
_aps.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _aps, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_aps.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _aps.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.aps = AugenPriceSpike()
self.aps.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.aps, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.aps.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.aps.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with time/decimal pair. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

private AugenPriceSpike _aps;
private Symbol _symbol;

// In Initialize()
_aps = new AugenPriceSpike();
_symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _aps.Update(data[_symbol].EndTime, data[_symbol].High);
}
if (_aps.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _aps.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.aps = AugenPriceSpike()
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.aps.Update(data[self.symbol].EndTime, data[self.symbol].High)
if self.aps.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.aps.Current.Value
